mapper.sql: id, name, stage, field, introduce, web, phone, createtime, updatetime, enabled
mapper.insert: insert into zf_invest (id, name, stage, field, introduce, web, phone, createtime, updatetime, enabled) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{field,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{web,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT})

id,
name,

field,
introduce,

phone,

mapper.update:
update zf_invest
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stage = #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
field = #{field,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
introduce = #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
web = #{web,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update zf_invest set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stage = #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, field = #{field,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, introduce = #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, web = #{web,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select * from zf_invest i where i.enabled = 0
and find_in_set(#{param1},i.stage)
and find_in_set(#{param2},i.field)
